title: Square One Publishers
content: Square One Publishers is a publishing company, founded in 2000 by Rubin "Rudy" Shur, a former Avery Publishing president.[1] Rudy Shur is the Chief Executive Officer.[2] Their offices are located in Garden City, New York, home to other publisher's offices.[1] In April 2016, Square One Publishers acquired Ocean Publishing, located in Flageler Beach, Florida, with the intent to keep the Ocean Publishing name as an imprint.[3] Later that year, Square One Publishers acquired the rights to five novels by James Misko, marking the entry into fictional titles.[4]
